casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Hurston, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Hurston (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 110.]

(No. 97-2677 Submitted August 19, 1998 Decided September 16, 1998.) Mathias H. Heck, Jr., Montgomery County Prosecuting Attorney, and Karen L. Sollars, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Raymond Hurston, pro se.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Rush (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 53, 697 N.E.2d 634.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
